summary: Dedicated sales and customer service professional focused on customer satisfaction, speed and accuracy in handling inquiries, professionalism, patience and efficiency to minimize dissatisfaction and boost customer loyalty. Proficient in SAP, active listening, forklift operation, quick learning and strategic thinking.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Received and processed cash and credit payments for in-store purchases. Placed special merchandise orders for customers. Shared product knowledge with customers while making personal recommendations. Worked as a team member to provide the highest level of service to customers. Maintained friendly and professional customer interactions. Helped customers apply for the store credit card. Met incoming customers and provided immediate assistance. Completed purchases with cash, credit and debit payment methods. Answered incoming telephone calls with professional and knowledgeable responses.

experience.title: Ambassador
experience.description: Ambassador - helped train new hires on how to stow items by Amazon standards. Roles included Stower (placing items on shelves), Picker (selecting items for shipment), Receive (unpacking items and placing them in totes), IOL (Inventory in Odd Locations) - locating mis-stowed items, and Destroy (logging and disposing expired or broken items). Also coordinated donations to local organizations.

experience.title: Stower
experience.description: Stower – Put items on shelves to be sold or sent to other fulfillment centers. Worked as a coach for temporary agency during peak season; provided feedback on quality and productivity; observed stowers' work and reported areas for improvement to supervisor.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Call center for Bank Of America. Provided accurate and appropriate information in response to customer inquiries. Addressed customer service inquiries in a timely and accurate fashion. Handled banking deposits, transfers, balance inquiries, travel flags, and other inquiries that customers had.

experience.title: Courier
experience.description: Picked up and delivered parts statewide for trucks and heavy machinery.

experience.title: Barn Assistant
experience.description: Worked with foals until they were two years old: socializing, teaching manners, leading, brushing, clipping, and helping them adjust to standing for farrier and vet care. Prepared horses for shows, grooming and braiding. Transported horses to vet, show grounds and other barns.

experience.title: Cashier
experience.description: Took phone orders and shipped out products to customers. Assessed customer needs and responded to questions. Cleaned and straightened work area. Operated cash register with proficiency. Provided professional and courteous service at all times. Greeted customers promptly and responded to questions. Counted and balanced cashier drawers.

experience.title: Cycle Counter
experience.description: Used SAP to perform cycle counting for inventory control. Fixed discrepancies found during daily counts in the SAP system.

experience.title: Assistant Trainer
experience.description: Helped train and care for AQHA horses for show and sale. Showed horses for clients in Florida, Georgia, North and South Carolina at AQHA shows. Transported horses to vet, show grounds and other barns. Lived on the premises and were responsible for checking on the horses day and night.

experience.title: Procurement Associate
experience.description: Equipment operator working compaction presses and conveyor furnaces. Set up new process under the supervision of plant manager. Shipping and receiving: shipping clerk—pulling inventory, packing and shipping product to customers per sales orders. Receiving clerk—received shipments from other divisions, checked packing lists, entered into SAP and placed in inventory. Logistics and Procurement: Used SAP to issue purchase orders for manufacturing supplies. Issued manufacturing work orders, coordinating with sales department. Placed orders for product to be bought from different divisions within the corporation to be inventoried or used in manufacturing.

experience.title: Kennel Worker
experience.description: Conducted physical exams and other routine health care procedures. Managed shelter for animals and arranged for adoption or euthanasia of confiscated animals. Adhered to high standards of safety, cleanliness and professionalism. Assisted veterinarians in examining animals. Restrained animals during veterinary procedures. Evaluated animals brought in by control officers and public.
